title: Homeopathy
author: Name
description: Homeopathy is a holistic medicine that uses highly diluted substances with the aim of triggering the body's own healing mechanisms.
cleaned_text: the principle of "like treats like" - that is, a substance that can cause symptoms when taken in large doses and can be used in small amounts to treat similar symptoms. For example, drinking too much coffee can cause sleeplessness and agitation, so according to this principle, when made into a homeopathic medicine, it could be used to treat people suffering from sleeplessness and agitation. Availability: 16 in stock
